snippet.title: The Banner Saga -- Your Saga Starts Now Trailer | PS4, Vita
snippet.description:
The Banner Saga is an epic Viking RPG game where your choice in travel, conversation, and combat determines the outcome of your own personal story as well as the survival of an entire civilization. Immerse yourself in a world brought to life by stunning 2D animation and art, a unique tactical combat system and a cast of unforgettable characters. A beautiful and haunting original score by Grammy nominated, and two-time BAFTA winner, composer Austin Wintory completes this unforgettable journey.

http://www.stoicstudio.com
